data.title: Jewellery chain launches special Eid promotion
data.meta_description: Jewellery chain launches special Eid promotion
data.text:
Joyalukkas has announced Eid al-Adha special offers and exclusive gifts at all its branches in Qatar for 10 days from today.

A 2g coin is free with purchases worth QR5,000 of the signature collection of high-quality diamond, polki and pearl jewellery under the promotion that runs until September 26.

Further, from September 23 to September 24, a free quarter gram gold coin is given free with purchases worth QR3,000 of gold jewellery.

“Eid is different from all other occasions,” said John Paul Joy Alukkas, executive director, Joyalukkas Group. “It is an event that we all celebrate by gathering together our family and loved ones and being more generous towards others. And this is reflected in the offers we have at Joyalukkas for this season.”

There is also a zero making charge on 8g 22k gold coins and a 0% instalment plan up to six months. Joyalukkas Group is a multi-billion dollar global conglomerate, with varied business interests. The group operates its various business operations across the UAE, Saudi Arabia, Bahrain, Oman, Kuwait, Qatar, Singapore, Malaysia, London and India. The businesses include jewellery, money exchange, fashion and textiles, luxury air charters, malls and realty.
